articles.content: When the Disney+ series She-Hulk: Attorney at Law was first announced, the series was simply called She-Hulk. However, head writer Jessica Gao revealed that a comment from Marvel Studios Kevin Feige … [+1336 chars]

articles.title: Cleveland-born ‘It’s a Wonderful Life’ actor dies at 97 - WJW FOX 8 News Cleveland
articles.description: A Cleveland-born actor most famous for her role in “It’s a Wonderful Life” has died at age 97.
articles.content:
ANN ARBOR, Mich. (WJW) A Cleveland-born actor most famous for her role in “It’s a Wonderful Life” has died at age 97.
